title: Wounded Hero
description: It’s supposed to be one wild night in Nashville. Another night flirting with strangers; another night pretending I’m not desperately lonely.Then, I meet a man with pain in his eyes and lies on his lips. A man even more isolated and damaged than I am.He lives a life of secrets and solitude, but the connection between us is undeniable. I know I’ll never see him again, but for one passionate night, we’ll hold together the broken pieces of each other’s souls. Wounded Hero is the prequel to Wounded Hearts.
author: Julia Sykes
